title: So this Is Jollygood
creator_credit: W&F Film Service Ltd, Sir Michael Balcon and Tex Ringworm
brief_description: During one of the periodic slumps in the British Film Industry, Adrian Brunel produced several satires on “film” types. This one describes the trials of a film producer, the hunt for a financier, shows some of the “technicians” and actors (such as the great Rhubarb Vaselino), and concludes with an excerpt from the production of a harrowing drama. Other credits include: Camera artist - S.L.U. Lloyd, Electrical effects - John D’Arc, Scenario - Saimole Story.
